column4: how would i find out using ssh the remote host display number?
guys how would i find out the remote host display numbner using ssh
aka. DISPLAY=?.?
echo $DISPLAY
oh thanks
the command u gave me only displays the display numbre im using
how do i find out the display iof the computer im connecting to
echo $DISPLAY    on the remote host
it says the display number im using
sure, which one do you want else? 1st is :0 , 2nd :1 etc.pp
i want to be able to launch programs on thr remote pc
like play a sound on the laptop that im connected to
1st xsession is :0 , 2nd :1 etc.pp, you'll have to set DISPLAY and xauthority
do u know?
how?
easiest way, use sux (if remote installed)
ok iw ll try
so how would i get sux to display remote pc number
how would i use sux?
man sux
to display the display number?
